name: Mobile Combat Experimental
description:
You are the commander of a giant tank prototype.   Closer in size to a small ship.  Dropped on to an uncolonized planet to explore and experiment with the tank.

A top-down 2d game where you roam around on a planet surface interacting  with or destroying the local aliens, customizing your tank, and seeing what humanity has been up to on the planet.

Made with Godot.  Godot Engine license.
